original_text: And they shall be desolate in the midst of the countries that are desolate, and her cities shall be in the midst of the cities that are wasted.
korean_text: 황폐한 나라들 같이 그들도 황폐할 것이며 사막이 된 성읍들 같이 그 성읍들도 사막이 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: in the midst of the countries that are desolate
in the midst of the cities that are wasted
sentences.korean_translation: 폐허가 된 성읍들의 중심에서 있을 것이다
